full_summary:
# Stage 1 - Sewer Rehabilitation (Phase 3) - Waskesiu Lake, Prince Albert National Park

### Tender Information
**Tender Title:** Stage 1 - Sewer Rehabilitation (Phase 3) - Waskesiu Lake, Prince Albert National Park
**Reference Number:** cb-528-13677112
**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-24-0033/A
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** June 11, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 26, 2024, 16:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** July 15, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** October 31, 2024

### Tender Status
The tender is expired.

### Goods/Services Required
- Sewer line construction service 
- Plumbing or sewer inspection service

### Pre-qualification Requirements
- Companies must demonstrate compliance with Parks Canada's requirements
- Only companies who submit a pre-qualification response will be qualified for Stage 2

### Tendering Procedure
- This is a two-stage tendering process
- Stage 1 will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers
- Stage 2 will invite the qualified suppliers to provide further qualifications and a financial bid

### Special Requirements
- Companies must provide a guaranteed Indigenous Participation Plan
- Parks Canada estimates the project value to be between $250,001 > $ 500,000, taxes included
- Schedule: All work must be completed by October 31, 2024
- Time-sensitive deliverables are subject to clause 8.6 of the tendering document

### Contact Information
Alison Guilford, mail: alison.guilford@pc.gc.ca, phone: (204) 390-7234, fax: (855) 983-1808.
Attachments:

- Invitation to Qualify - [ISQ-Phase-1---5P468-24-0033.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39937/isq-phase-1---5p468-24-0033.pdf
